competitors.name: Edgecast
competitors.notes: CDN provider, later acquired by Verizon

context: Cloudflare launched publicly in September 2010 at TechCrunch Disrupt. The company offered free CDN and security services to democratize web performance. Akamai dominated the enterprise CDN market while Cloudflare targeted the long tail of websites. Amazon CloudFront (launched 2008) was emerging. Cloudflare differentiated with free tier and security focus including DDoS mitigation. The founding vision was to build a better internet for everyone.
